terms.title: Terms & Conditions
terms.intro: By ordering via the Man & Brouw webshop you confirm that you are at least 18 years old and accept the conditions below.

orders.title: Orders & Availability
items: Products, tickets and merchandise are offered in limited batches. Items in your cart are only reserved after payment is completed.
We may cancel or refund an order if stock discrepancies, age verification issues or pricing errors occur. You will always be notified first.

shipping.title: Shipping & Pickup
items: Deliveries are currently available within Belgium only. We'll let you know as soon as your parcel leaves the brewery.
Pickup orders are ready at Aarschotsesteenweg 179 in Wilsele. Please bring the confirmation email (no ID required).

events.title: Events & Tickets
items: Event tickets are issued digitally and linked to the purchaser's email address.
Unless explicitly stated, tickets are non-refundable but can be transferred to another attendee by emailing us at least 48 hours in advance.

returns.title: Returns & Right of Withdrawal
items: Unopened merchandise can be returned within 14 days of delivery. Contact us first so we can create a return label.
Perishable goods (beer, food) and opened bottles cannot be returned unless they arrived damaged. Please send photos within 48 hours.

liability.title: Liability
items: Man & Brouw is not liable for delays or losses caused by third-party carriers once a parcel has been handed over.
Our beers contain alcohol. Enjoy responsibly and ensure they are not consumed by minors.
